message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1100000. This is a great deal considering its value to you.  Let me know your thoughts!
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm only willing to pay $950000 for the product. This is a fair price considering its value to me and leaves room for both of us to walk away with a good deal.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not able to go that low. I'm willing to come down to $1050000. This still gives you a good deal and allows me to make a reasonable profit. Let's try to find a middle ground here.
Alice, I understand your position, but I'm still only able to offer $1000000. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to accept, I'll have to buy the product from John.
